description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $928.9K
  in 2020-2021 on contracts with D Breau et Fils. The average
  contract duration was 1.42 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.4M. The longest
  contract was 1.42 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.4M.
lookup_name: 'D BREAU ET FILS'
